announcements.title: Welcome back! Spring semester begins today!
announcements.content: See you in class! Have a wonderful semester!

announcements.title: Guest Lecture on the Future of User Interface Design
announcements.content: Students, we have a secret surprise guest lecturer. Make sure you come to class in-person if you can!

announcements.title: Workshop on Advanced Rendering Techniques
announcements.content: I have rescheduled the workshop to be on the 02-26 from 9am to 11am to accomodate your midterms. Good luck and see you soon

announcements.title: Senior Design Project Kickoff Meeting
announcements.content: Everyone, having an in person meeting today. Can't wait!

announcements.title: Reminder: Midterm Exams Scheduled for Next Week
announcements.content: Good luck! Halfway there, you got this!

announcements.title: Research Conference on Emerging Technologies in Computer Science
announcements.content: Happening today! Super excited, see you soon!
